rules.name: Downtown Office District
rules.description: C-3-O is a downtown commercial district permitting office, retail, and mixed uses with specific height and bulk controls. High-density commercial development is encouraged in the downtown core.
rules.max_height_note: Subject to height district; base streetwall and tower controls apply.
rules.bulk_note: Bulk measured per 132.1; base and lower tower dimensions apply in C-3-O(SD).

rules.name: Neighborhood Commercial (Small Scale)
rules.description: NC-2 districts allow small-scale neighborhood-serving retail and services with limited size and intensity.
rules.max_height_note: Typically 40–65 ft depending on height district.
rules.bulk_note: Neighborhood commercial bulk limits; check height and bulk map.

rules.name: Community Commercial District
rules.description: C-2 supports community-serving commercial uses, including retail, office, and residential.
rules.bulk_note: Standard commercial bulk; see height and bulk district.
